text: Ralph Vincent Guglielmi (June 26, 1933 â€“ January 23, 2017) was an American football player. He played as a quarterback. He played in the National Football League (NFL) for the Washington Redskins, St. Louis Cardinals, New York Giants and the Philadelphia Eagles. Guglielmi was born in Columbus, Ohio. He died on January 23, 2017 in Wallace, North Carolina, aged 83. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American football quarterbacks Category:New York Giants players Category:Sportspeople from Columbus, Ohio Category:Philadelphia Eagles players Category:St. Louis Cardinals players Category:Washington Redskins players
title: Ralph Guglielmi
